Just to ensure that they compile and run properly.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7337?focusedCommentId=17092940) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I think it would be more fruitful to sort out automation for running benchmarks on machines where we actually want to retain the produced benchmark data. They don't need to run all the time so this would save GHA compute time
